variant.question: Which is a correct statement with reference to an RNAV SID?

options.text: The RNAV SID can be flown without ground-based radio navigation aids.
The aircraft must be fitted with an auto-flight system to follow the RNAV SID.
An RNAV SID is a departure procedure that is limited by the transition altitude.
RNAV SIDs are unavailable if a ground-based radio navigation aid is used.

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - charts10-3A from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017.  
What is the correct procedure for the SID CATON 2C?

options.text: Runway heading to 4500 ft then above FL 80 at VILNA, above FL 110 at NARGO and not above FL 230 at CATON.
3500 feet at D9.5 ALT, not above FL 80 at VILNA, Leval at FL 110 NARGO and FL 230 at CATON
3100 feet or higher at D9.5, FL 80 or higher at VILNA, FL110 or higher at NARGO, not above FL 230 at CATON
3100 feet or higher at D9.5 ALT, FL 110 or higher at VILNA, FL110 or higher at NARGO, not above FL 230 at CATON

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - charts 10-2, 10-2A, 10-2B, 10-2C and ENROUTE chart "E LO 6".   
 When planning a flight from Munich to Alicante, airway A34 is used for the last section and the intended runway is runway 10 from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017\. Which of the following STARs should be used?

Refer to Stuttgart 10-3P chart from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017.  
What is the minimum equipment required to fly the DKB9B SID procedure, referring to the BRNAV requirement?

options.text: GPS only
VOR/DME
DME; NDB
DME; GPS or VOR/DME

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - charts 10-3A, 10-3B, 10-3C, 10-3D from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017\.   
 An aircraft departs from runway 10\. Which of the following SIDs will be used?

options.text: RESTU 1B
CATON 2C
MITOS 2A
MAGAL 2D

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - Charts 10-2A, 10-2B, 10-2C, 10-2D from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017\.   
You are preparing for a fight from MANCHESTER to ALICANTE, along the route:

EGCC/23R SANBA1R SANBA N859 HON UN859 BALAN UL152 MAKOX UN860 VLC LEAL/10.

Which of the following charts will you consider when choosing an arrival route to decide which STAR to load into your FMS route?
What statement below is correct regarding the difference between an RNAV STAR and an RNAV STAR overlay?

options.text: An RNAV STAR overlay CANNOT follow the same route as a STAR that is defined by ground based navigation aids.
An RNAV STAR overlay will have a longer route distance than an RNAV STAR as it has less constraints.
An RNAV STAR overlay will follow the same route as a STAR that is defined by ground based navigation aids.
An RNAV STAR overlay will have a shorter route distance than an RNAV STAR as it has less constraints.

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - charts 10-2, 10-2A, 10-2B, 10-2C and ENROUTE chart "E LO 6".   
 When planning a flight from Munich to Alicante, airway A34 is used for the last section and the intended runway is runway 10 from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017\. Which of the following STARs should be used?

options.text: VALENCIA 2L
MABUX 1P
GREVU 1M
ASTRO 1L

variant.question: What is the difference between an RNAV STAR and RNAV STAR overlay?

options.text: The RNAV STAR overlay is a shorter route than the RNAV STAR.
The RNAV STAR is designed to replace the conventional navigation systems routing.
The RNAV STAR allows for efficient sequencing of the traffic flow, thus reducing the workload of the ATC.
The RNAV STAR overlay is a longer route than the RNAV STAR.

variant.question: What is the primary reason for the pre-flight study of the anticipated SID and STAR? To ensure that..

options.text: the most economical routes are flown.
the aircraft is guided along the correct lateral and vertical profiles.
pre-planned in-flight deviations from the published procedures can be accommodated.
noise abatement procedures are complied with.

variant.question: What is the difference between an RNAV SID and an RNAV overlay SID?

options.text: The RNAV overlay SID will follow the same track as the conventional procedure.
The RNAV overlay SID will take more time due to less constraints.
The RNAV overlay SID will take less time due to less constraints.
The RNAV overlay SID is a longer route than the RNAV SID.

variant.question:
Refer to ALICANTE - charts 10-2, 10-2A, 10-2B, 10-2C from Jeppesen GSPRM 2017\.   
 A flight from Great Britain to Spain, destination ALICANTE, is going to pass VALENCIA VOR/DME. Which of the following STAR charts would be suitable?

options.text: Chart 10-2C.
Chart 10-2B.
Chart 10-2.
Chart 10-2A.
